    level="1"

>
[Swashbuckler's Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=1863) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 153 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Swashbuckler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=43)

**Prerequisites**
[Swashbuckler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1859)

</column>

---

You've learned to riposte against ill-conceived attacks. You gain the Opportune Riposte reaction.

<document level="2" id="action-551" />
name: Swashbuckler's Riposte
